Package entities.orders

Class Airlift

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.orders.Airlift
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orders
    public class Airlift
extends java.lang.Object
implements Orders
    This class represents the airlift card. The Airlift Card allows you to transfer your armies long distances. Each time you play one, you can do a single transfer from any of your territories to any other territory of yours. Similar to a normal transfer, those armies can't do any other action that turn.

        public Airlift​(Player p_player,
               int p_countryNameFrom,
               int p_countryNameTo,
               int p_armies)
        Constructor for assigning the initial values that will be required during the execution of the commands
        Parameters:
        p_player - player who is firing airlift command
        p_countryNameFrom - country from which the reinforcements are to be taken
        p_countryNameTo - country to which the reinforcements are to be placed
        p_armies - number of reinforcements to be moved
